content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Kid-friendly resorts and vacation rentals can make a huge difference in the overall vacation experience for families. A water park or kids' club can be a great way to keep your 7-year-old entertained and active during the trip.

Remember to also consider the location and amenities of the resort or vacation rental. Make sure it's close to the activities and attractions you want to visit, and that it has amenities like restaurants, pools, and game rooms that will appeal to your child.

Additionally, be sure to check the age range and rules for the kids' club or water park, as some may have restrictions or requirements. And don't forget to book any kids' programs or activities in advance, as they may fill up quickly.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. I'm here to help.

Oh, and one more thing! If you do end up booking a kid-friendly resort or vacation rental, be sure to let your 7-year-old help with the planning process. Show them the pictures and amenities, and let them help choose the activities and excursions. It's a great way to get them excited about the trip and make them feel more invested in the experience.
